home.title: Perfect 'IT' solutions to grow your business!
home.text: Entrust your project to experts with more than 10 years of experience and achieve high success in a short time.

faq.faqTitle1: Why are the prices so cheap?
faq.faqText1: Our prices are really cheap compared to the quality. The reason is that we don't have excess labor in our web studio, so we don't have excess costs. That's why we keep our prices low compared to others.
faq.faqTitle2: Will I be able to edit the site myself in the future?
faq.faqText2: Yes, of course, you will be given access and instructions to the content management system (adminka). Adminka has a convenient interface, is intuitive and does not require specific knowledge.
faq.faqTitle3: Will you continue to support the site after it's finished?
faq.faqText3: Once we've finished your site, we'll keep it running for free, 24/7 for one year. After one year, it's $10/month.
